title: What's your 'it happened in a dream' skin?
body:
For me, pool party vel'koz would be one of the coolest skins possible for him. Pool noodle arms, beach balls for eyes, a little floaty vest for his armor, and a watery interior for it to all float in, in place of his glow. I don't see it happening but there's hope. After all, rek'sai got the jetski skin! 

What's your skin that you really wish would be made, but you're just stuck being hopeful on?

That's... A combination I've honestly never considered. Giant pink lasers of doom... E is a big ol' heart flying out... I have no idea how you'd do w or ult tho
Lore based skins in general.
Like who/what specifically? I feel like the base skins are as lore specific as you get, other than stuff like captain gp.
For example Pre-noxus Xin zhao, Demacian Taric, Myisha Kinkou Zed, Pre Darkin Varus, Aatrox, King Jarvan IV, or Even some random ones like the Bilgewater garen quinn aatrox ones.

Can the Bilgewater Garen, Quinn, Aatrox, etc. skin be counted as "lore skins"?

They are actually just "what ifs" in case these champions would have lived in Bilgewater instead of their real origins, aren't they?
But if you count these, I would definitely enjoy seeing more of these, too.

Hm, there are some coming to my mind.

{{champion:164}} Bloodmoon Camille
I think she would work really well in that skin line. In my imagination, she is based on the ghost tale of the kuchisake-onna. White mask with a mouth that is slit wide open, her legs are each one half of a scissor. Chains with kunai at the ends for her hookshot. Her passive would be either a blood orb swirling around her (AD shield) or blue ghosts (AP shield).

{{champion:113}} Chemtech Sejuani
I would _absolutely love_ a chemtech motorbike. Basically Sejuani as a Zaunite, chemtech driven motorbike instead of bristle. Her weapon is a flask with green goo on a chain. Passive lets the tubes on her bike glow green if it is active and the Zaun crest on top of her. Q is a wheelie, E covers the enemy in green goo instead of ice. Same with R, instead of an icestorm in the area there are green fumes.

{{champion:51}} {{champion:254}}  Star Guardian Caitlyn & Vi
I want them to be together in a team of Star Guardians. They would be so great. Caitlyn is the intelligent, responsible class represent. Vi is the always brawling tomboy. They always hang out together and no one understands why, since they are so different. Maybe hinting even some romance here, it would be so god damn cute.

{{champion:6}} Boneyard Urgot
Halloween skin. Urgot is an unholy abomination built out of the bones of different creatures. His arm cannon is the skull of a dragon and it shoots blue ghost flames. For his ultimate, he is opening his ribcage and his rips start moving like teeth, tearing you to pieces.

______________________

And the most unrealistic one: {{champion:154}} FEMALE ZAC 
Give me a sexy slime girl like Suu.
https://images-cdn.9gag.com/photo/a0KmRPd_460s.jpg
POOL. PARTY. GRAGAS.
Could definitely have some fun animations with that. He'd be in a speedo of course, right?
Battle/Secret Boss Mordekaiser
Morde's finally 'eligible' for a skin now that he's not a buggy disaster, I bet hell get some cool stuff sooner or later. 8 bit mace of doom seems like a good choice

Oh I thought you meant a skin that literally was in a dream. Because the answer to that is I had a nightmare where I was on the rift and getting smoked by a Thunderlord Brand.

But if its just skins I wish was made, Zil is getting a skin later this year and it being Dunkmaster/Three Pointer Zil would be great, it has such amazing sound effect potential, and making a bm character even better at his job.

I also wish the chemtech skinline was used again in general since I love the Zaun aesthetic, but the only chemtech skin is Trynds. (Which I do love.)

Brand could definitely work with lightning, his w animation would probably be awesome.

Chemtech and hextech I think are super underused. There was a cool chemtech sej idea here that I could definitely get behind.

Spidurgot. 
He shoots webs with Q, venom spit for passive and his ult Strangles a target with a web and on reactivation he eats them.
Preatorian Ivern

2 main ones I've hoped for but won't get, because the champs are unpopular.

[Kitsune Kindred](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3vbluw/kitsune_kindred_skin_concept/) (Art made by JellyEnvy)

Skin looks absolutely amazing and I really wish it'd be implemented in one way or another. It also gave me major Okami vibes.

[Battle Boss Vel'Koz](https://i.redd.it/h3bggyijh3431.png) (Art made by Amuyopo)

Considering this years Battle Boss ( and Arcade in my personal opinion) selection, I think it's needless to say that this would have trumped the real skins.
My dreams are simple. Star Guardian Yuumi for maximum cuteness
That skin would be adorable. Unfortunately, as someone who hates facing yummi, that would just conflict me more about banning her.

I have my shirtless Jhin(Dark Cosmic), so in terms of that, I'm good.

[Candy Land Massacre Jhin](https://i.imgur.com/Cvv9aJ3.jpg) is my top choice for a "sillier" skin for him, though.

Also, Dragon Trainer/Caretaker Bard.

Cosmic Reaver Pyke. I want it sooo bad.

Main design:

- His hook/dagger would be [a sickle or curved sword](https://img2.cgtrader.com/items/2013834/f95d2bb173/noob-saibot-weapon-sickle-scythe-from-mortal-kombat-11-3d-model-obj-mtl-fbx-stl.jpg).

- His base model would have white and gold sacrificial/cultist style robes similar to Cosmic Reaver Kassadin.

- His mask would be the usual Cosmic Reaver mask but broken in half. His eye would release stars and nebulas.

Abilities: 

 - Most abilities would be purple/blue with galaxy designs to them.

 - Q would just be the sickle being thrown or stabbing forward, nothing too special.

 - W would put Pyke into a galaxy or deep space setting. Indicator would be stars or comets flying around his targets.

- E would leave stars or constellations in his path as he dashed.

- Ultimate would be one large constellation, similar to the cross shape that Cosmic Reaver Kassadin leaves uses when recalling. When landing the ult, the burst from the ground opens up a temporary small galaxy.

Voice lines (basically just rewrites of his normal ones:)

 - "I was born where stars died, I died where stars were born."

- "Dark matter flows through my veins."

- "Madness lurks above." 

- "Went too deep, part of me is still up there... in the void..."


 I woke up and have never cried harder.
